Rafael, can you still reproduce the bug now? If so, could you please log the 
steps you have taken?

With 3.0 M8 and the RelEng plug-in version 3.0.4, I could not reproduce the problem.

(As a side note, when I tried executing the "Compare with released" action
without having the map files loaded - no org.eclipse.releng project - it failed
with a NPE. I would expect it to show an error dialog telling me the reason it
failed, since is something you can easily ensure before trying the operation).
This hasn't happened for me for ages. I believe it has been fixed a while ago.
Yes, it was fixed a while ago
